Enemy attack!\""},{"lineNumber":143692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、魔物将軍発見！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, we've found the demon general!\""},{"lineNumber":143693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":143694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴様、正気か？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Are you sane?"},{"lineNumber":143695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけの人数で敵陣ド真ん中に来るとは」","translatedEnglishLine":"To come right into the middle of enemy lines with only that many people?\""},{"lineNumber":143696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大将を殺すにはこの手が一番早いからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the fastest way to kill the commander.\""},{"lineNumber":143697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「観念しろ、お前には罪がある」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Give up, you are guilty.\""},{"lineNumber":143698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":143699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前の罪はただひとつ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your crime is just one thing!\""},{"lineNumber":143700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……一般人を殺したことか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That you killed civilians.\""},{"lineNumber":143701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様の女を苛めたことだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That you tormented my woman!\""},{"lineNumber":143702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺様の勝ちー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, I win!\""},{"lineNumber":143703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、ひぃーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-ek!\""},{"lineNumber":143704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おい、どうすんだよ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey, what do we do!?\""},{"lineNumber":143705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将軍がやられちまったぞ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The general has been killed!?\""},{"lineNumber":143706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どうするって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what do you mean what do we do...?"},{"lineNumber":143707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　トップがいない俺達だけじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just us without a leader...\""},{"lineNumber":143708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufuun.\""},{"lineNumber":143709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek.\""},{"lineNumber":143710,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが一歩進むと、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance took a step forward,"},{"lineNumber":143711,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに合わせて魔物兵達が一歩引いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon soldiers stepped back in response."},{"lineNumber":143712,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":143713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がおーーーーっ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gaoooooo!!!\""},{"lineNumber":143714,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわわわわわーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wahhhhhhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":143715,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが少し脅かしただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just by Rance threatening a little,"},{"lineNumber":143716,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵達は蜘蛛の子を散らすように逃げ出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon soldiers scattered like spiders fleeing."},{"lineNumber":143717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、これでここは全滅だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, with this, they're all wiped out here.\""},{"lineNumber":143718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、とっとと帰るか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, let's get back quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":143719,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが上杉軍陣地に戻ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance returned to the Uesugi army camp."},{"lineNumber":143720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、なにしてるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, what are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":143721,"originalJapaneseLine":"陣地の前では、謙信と愛達が何やら揉めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the camp, Kenshin and Ai were having some sort of argument."},{"lineNumber":143722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、謙信様が敵陣に行くと言って","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Kenshin-sama said he wanted to go to the enemy camp,"},{"lineNumber":143723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愛様が必死に止めてるところよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and Ai-sama is desperately trying to stop him.\""},{"lineNumber":143724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……愛」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ai.\""},{"lineNumber":143725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No.\""},{"lineNumber":143726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":143727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな顔しても駄目」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if you make that face, it's no good.\""},{"lineNumber":143728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……むう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Mmm.\""},{"lineNumber":143729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「唸っても駄目」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if you groan, it's no good.\""},{"lineNumber":143730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信、行く必要はないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kenshin, there's no need to go."},{"lineNumber":143731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の気にしていた敵なら俺が殺した」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have killed the enemy you were worried about.\""},{"lineNumber":143732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":143733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気になるなら誰か確認に走らせろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you're concerned, send someone to check."},{"lineNumber":143734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大将が死んだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the commander is dead,"},{"lineNumber":143735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　山の上の砦にはもう魔物一匹残っとらんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"there isn't a single demon left in the fort on the mountain.\""},{"lineNumber":143736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ、たったそれだけの人数で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh, with only that few,"},{"lineNumber":143737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍を倒してきたってこと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"you defeated the demon general!?\""},{"lineNumber":143738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様がいるのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because I am here."},{"lineNumber":143739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これくらい、とーぜん」","translatedEnglishLine":"This much is only natural.\""},{"lineNumber":143740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「者共！　敵襲！　敵襲だー！」
それだけの人数で敵陣ド真ん中に来るとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To come right into the middle of enemy lines with only that many people?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大将を殺すにはこの手が一番早いからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the fastest way to kill the commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「観念しろ、お前には罪がある」
将軍がやられちまったぞ！？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what do you mean what do we do...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トップがいない俺達だけじゃ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance took a step forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに合わせて魔物兵達が一歩引いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon soldiers stepped back in response.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが少し脅かしただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by Rance threatening a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵達は蜘蛛の子を散らすように逃げ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon soldiers scattered like spiders fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、これでここは全滅だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, with this, they're all wiped out here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが上杉軍陣地に戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance returned to the Uesugi army camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣地の前では、謙信と愛達が何やら揉めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the camp, Kenshin and Ai were having some sort of argument.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、謙信様が敵陣に行くと言って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Kenshin-sama said he wanted to go to the enemy camp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛様が必死に止めてるところよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Ai-sama is desperately trying to stop him."
"Even if you make that face, it's no good."
"Even if you groan, it's no good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の気にしていた敵なら俺が殺した」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have killed the enemy you were worried about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気になるなら誰か確認に走らせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're concerned, send someone to check.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山の上の砦にはもう魔物一匹残っとらんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there isn't a single demon left in the fort on the mountain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええっ、たったそれだけの人数で、
魔物将軍を倒してきたってこと！？」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
